articles.content: "I told them how proud I was of them and there's nothing they could do to disappointment me. Yeah, there were plays I wish they had done different or made, but these kids gave everything, even in thi… [+4297 chars]

articles.author: Dick Harmon
articles.title: BYU’s loss to Alabama will sting, but Kevin Young is just getting started - Deseret News
articles.description: Kevin Young got off to a great start in his first season coaching the BYU basketball team. What does the future hold for Kevin Young and the Cougars?
articles.content:
After BYUs loss to Alabama, theres a feeling that head coach Kevin Young was just kicking the tires this year.
Instead of the end of a season, it may be the start of a new era for Cougar basketball.… [+6031 chars]
